title: Zealot Gaming Is Recruiting For A Serious Diamond Ranked Team!

embed.description: Zealot Gaming is a multiplatform gaming community which offers clan-support for a variety of games in various genres. It was started in March of 2011 by two friends, DrMath (James) and Legit (Stan), to be a gaming-centric community focused on a providing friendly atmosphere, a sense of family, and a team passionate for gaming free, of the drama of bloated structures and politics that often comes with it.

body:
Greetings!

Zealot Gaming is recruiting players ranked Diamond V or higher for our Oceanic Diamond+ Division Ranked team, if you're looking for a team without stressful schedules yet still serious and determined to improve, if you're looking for a friendly and professional atmosphere then I implore you to sign up [HERE!](http://www.zealotgaming.com/showthread.php?t=33399)

Watching replays, coaching and game analysis will be a core part of these teams and we expect you to willingly participate in these activities. The end goal is for the players on these teams to overall improve together, ideally to reach the tiers of Diamond/Challenger. Members will be required to have Teamspeak 3 for communication and feel free to contact myself (GalaxyBear) or Team Manager Diesel (IGN: Dead Diesel) with any questions or concerns. 

See you soon!
[zG]GalaxyBear - Team Manager
